content.description: Polypeptides are continuously being formed and degraded. One of these processes is shown.
content.question: Figure 1. Polypeptide reaction Which statement is the most accurate description of the reaction shown in Figure 1?

choices.label: It represents monomers linked by dehydration synthesis.
It represents a polypeptide chain that folds to form the tertiary structure.
It represents a polypeptide chain that is denatured into the primary structure.
It represents a polypeptide chain that is broken down through a hydrolysis reaction.

content.answer: It represents a polypeptide chain that is broken down through a hydrolysis reaction.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
